original_title: エクスタシーチェイサー：ソナ　最も淫靡な標的
overview: The darkness of the Ryukyu counterfeit syndicate, pursued by a beautiful woman with a fierce background!!  The sexy investigative duo's beautiful naked body dances for justice!! Sona, the most beautiful public security investigator who landed in Okinawa to chase the counterfeit syndicate formed by the yakuza and a certain country. Her enchanting dynamite body lures out dangers lurking in the depths of the tropical night, and she overwhelms her enemies with overwhelming eroticism and combat skills. stands in your way... Keep your eyes peeled for the SEX&ACTION that will blow your mind and the shocking ending!
title: Ecstasy Chaser: Sona Lustful Target
